Item ID1631

Uncut dragonstones are a type of gem, which require 55 Crafting to cut. They can be obtained from the crystal chest in Taverley, unlocked with a crystal key, along with other various items. Using a chisel to cut the dragonstone will grant 137.5 Crafting experience and result in a cut dragonstone.

While uncut dragonstones are available from the gem shop within Mor Ul Rek for 1,500 Tokkul, they are not in stock unless sold by another player. Their cut counterparts are dropped very rarely by a wide variety of monsters.

Training[edit | edit source]

Crafting[edit | edit source]

Dragonstones can be crafted into jewellery at a furnace by using a gold bar and the appropriate crafting mould.

Level Input Material Cost[1] Output Sell Price Profit / loss XP/Craft XP/Hour Coins/XP
55 Uncut dragonstone 14,520 Dragonstone 11,619 −2,901 137.5 398,750 −34.13
55 Dragonstone Gold bar 11,704 Dragonstone ring 11,720 16 100 65,000 0.19
72 Dragonstone Gold bar 11,704 Dragon necklace 11,806 102 105 68,250 1.13
74 Dragonstone Gold bar 11,704 Dragonstone bracelet 11,752 48 110 71,500 0.51
80 Dragonstone Gold bar 11,704 Dragonstone amulet (u) 11,798 94 150 97,500 1.57
80 Dragonstone amulet (u) Ball of wool 11,834 Dragonstone amulet 11,861 27 4 8,000 6.75

Magic[edit | edit source]

Dragonstone jewellery can be enchanted using Lvl-5 Enchant, requiring level 68 Magic. The spell requires 1 Cosmic rune, 15 Earth runes, 15 Water runes and the piece of Dragonstone Jewellery that is to be enchanted. When enchanted and charged, dragonstone jewellery is currently the only other means of teleportation that works up to level 30 Wilderness aside from the royal seed pod and the slayer ring.

Unenchanted Cost of Unenchanted Jewellery Material Cost[2] Enchanted Sell price Profit/Loss XP/Cast XP/Hour Coins/XP
Dragonstone ring 11,720 11,834 Ring of wealth 11,892 58 78 124,800 0.74
Dragon necklace 11,806 11,920 Skills necklace 12,006 86 78 124,800 1.1
Dragonstone bracelet 11,752 11,866 Combat bracelet 12,260 394 78 124,800 5.05
Dragonstone amulet 11,861 11,975 Amulet of glory 12,235 260 78 124,800 3.33

Other[edit | edit source]

Cut Dragonstones can also be used to make the following items:

  • Dragonstone bolt tips, which require level 71 Fletching and yield 8 experience per gem. Attempting to do this will bring up a message asking if the player is sure that they want to do so as the gems are considered valuable.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • In the Tower of Life quest, the player has to answer a question to the Homunculus about how dragons can breathe fire. One of the answers suggests that this is done with the power of 'magical dragonstones.' The other answer states that it happens through the ignition of gas when the dragon exhales. It is possible that the ignition of dragonfire is mediated through some magical property of dragonstone crystals.

Notes[edit | edit source]

  1. ^ Cost calculated assuming all inputs are purchased from the Grand Exchange.
  2. ^ Cost calculated using a Mud battlestaff (provides unlimited Earth runes and Water runes) and includes costs of Cosmic runes.
